author: Simon Difford
description: While the name may suggest aggression this aperitivo is gentle, caressing, and only moderately flinted in alcohol.
name: Fix One's Flint
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
